definitions.definition: belonging to a period of history that is thousands of years in the past

examples.text: Archaeologists are excavating the ruined temples of this **ancient civilization**.

definitions.definition: very old; having existed for a very long time

examples.text: the ancient Japanese art of origami
He's ancient—he must be at least fifty!
The area is still covered by huge ancient forests.

definitions.definition: the people who lived in ancient times, especially the Egyptians, Greeks and Romans

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from Old French ancien, based on Latin ante ‘before’.
